message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $175?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! However, $175 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $160?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $170?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! However, $170 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $165?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $167?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! However, $167 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $160?
